pages.text: The $(mob)Deceitful Snapper$() is a passive animal that spawns in the dark waters of the $(thing)Midnight$(). It does not react to being attacked, whether by players or other creatures.
$(mob)Deceiftul Snappers$() drop themselves on death, which serve as a good food source while raw. However, consuming the $(mob)Deceiftul Snappers$() comes with a chance to be attacked by it.
